name: Five Nights At Iron's Classic Collection
name_original: Five Nights At Iron's Classic Collection
description:
Five Nights at Iron's Classic Collection takes all the FNAI Series of games and puts them into one page.

These games are gonna be here while Iron's Medieval Playhouse takes it's own home.

Five Nights at Iron's 1: Welcome to Iron's Pizza Palace. Take form as the new Security Guard here at Iron's Pizza Palace. Make sure no one gets in or else.

Five Nights at Iron's 2: After Iron's Medieval Playhouse Closed down the new and improved Iron's Fun House is opened take the night shift and watch out for the animatronics breaking in.

Five Nights at Iron's Reconstructed: Take watch at Iron's Medieval Playhouse to make sure no one breaks in. Keep and eye out on the Animatronics. And make sure no one gets in. Can you Survive until 6 AM.
